message: Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $11,000. It's a steal considering its true value, and I'm confident it will be a great asset to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm really interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  $9,000 doesn't cover my costs. How about we split the difference and settle on $10,000?  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll be happy with this amazing product.
I understand you need to make a profit, but $10,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle.
